posts.post_content: [Talon Sliver](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Talon Sliver) is WAY better. Should have cost ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol) less and have 1 less power/toughness. Hey, what happens if I make a really big mana symbol? ![100000](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=100000&type=symbol). Ah. hmmm... ![100](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=100&type=symbol)? Sweeeeeeet! I wonder what costs that much? Can I do 1000? ![1000](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1000&type=symbol)? No? Oh well. That was fun. I hope someone rates this comment highly.
posts.html:
